1045290.name: Diesel Brothers: Truck Building Simulator - Cardboard Pickup Mechanic (Papercraft)
1045290.description:
Cardboard Pickup Mechanic DLC is packed with digital concept arts, sketches, and cardboard papercraft pickup truck schemes.

Take a ride into the world of diesel and discover how the game has been brought to life! Peek behind the graphic design process of the diesel-drinking machines from the game. Print your own diesel trucks, customize them, and put on display!

DLC includes:
  • Papercraft pickup truck schemes
  • Concept arts
  • Sketches
1045290.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语
